message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product. I'm excited to discuss the details with you. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $800000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to buy your product. However, $800000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this point. I'm willing to offer $700000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'm placing on it.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $750000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value it brings to your business.
